Html.name: Html0
Html.content: This part can also only be described in an abstract way because these steps depend on the specific project requirements. Anyway, the following description should be enough to get a picture of what needs to be done. Let’s make the main navigation shown above dynamic by copying and pasting the content of the file nav_main.jsp from the modules-v8 into the main-nav.jsp created one step before. Have a look at the section about the OpenCms JSP API of this documentation in order to get an impression about how to use the OpenCms specific tag library. Or learn how to create lists of resources and detail pages by reading the section about lists of resources and detail pages. And again the modules-v8 is a good starting point to learn more about writing JSPs or to “copy and paste” code that can be adjusted according to your needs.
